string.name: name
string.value: What the White Mama Monkey Stole
#p9000077#, a fruit seller at the #b#m950100000##k, seems to be very angry. Talk to #b#p9000077##k.

#p9000077# was angry that the #o9409014#s stole the #t4032636#s that he had left out to sell to the tourists. Eliminate the #r#o9409014#s#k and recover #b20 #t4032636#s#k at #p9000077#'s request. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k. \n\n#i4032636# #t4032636# #b#c4032636# / 20#k
You eliminated the #o9409014#s and recovered the #t4032636#s. Still, the #o9409014#s have their eyes on the #t4032636#s. Please come back #bin 1 hour#k.

Sheesh! What's the point of having these tourists if I can't sell a thing?! Huh? You want to buy some #t4032636#s? No! I can't sell them even if I wanted to! The #o9409014#s stole them all! And here I thought I was finally going to make some money... Sigh, I wish someone could help me.

Huh? You want to help me? Well, do you think you can handle it? The #o9409014#s aren't as weak as you might think... But if you're willing to help, just eliminate the #r#o9409014#s#k and recover #b20 #t4032636#s#k for me.
The ones who stole the limes went to the Monkey Temple. You can enter the temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k. Good luck!
That's what I thought. Well, it's my life and I got to deal with it...
You retrieved the #t4032636#s! Thank you! I'll be able to run my business again with these limes!

I used to practice kung-fu... But there's not much you can do with kung-fu in this town. I was wondering how I would make a living, when #p9000078# suddenly came up with the idea of turning the village into a tourist attraction. So, I started selling fruits to the tourists. Little did I know that I would encounter such problems...

The #o9409014#s never used to steal things from the village, but maybe they are acting this way because of the tourists. I'm starting to wonder if #p9000072# was right... #p9000072# was against turning the #m950100000# into a tourist attraction.

Ah, I shouldn't be blabbering, anyway. The #o9409014#s have their eyes on my cart. Who knows when they'll try to make an attempt at my #t4032636#s? I should keep my eyes on the cart for at least #b1 hour#k.
You haven't recovered the #b20 #t4032636#s#k yet? I told you the #r#o9409014#s#k weren't going to be easy... You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k.
